nodes.text: Kristoffer Tabori (born August 4, 1952) voiced HK-47 in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic. He voiced HK-47 again in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, as well as the HK-50 series assassin droids (some of which were cut from the final game).
